https://tmrev.io/movie/613450-Beyond the Arctic 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4FYxAU7Ey5oapGBMCtOTTacQdZK.jpg A team of an entrepreneur, an athlete and a student from Taiwan arrived in the Arctic Circle. Through their participation in the 2008 Polar Challenge – a 600 km race to the Magnetic North Pole, they’ve realized their dreams. They experienced hypothermia and attack from polar bears en route. Beyond the Arctic
